title: Current Annotation style
question: Hello! in Rhino we have Annotation style, there is current anotation style. How can i get name of it in grasshopper?

code_blocks.code:
import scriptcontext
import rhinoscriptsyntax as rs
import Rhino

scriptcontext.doc = Rhino.RhinoDoc.ActiveDoc

a = rs.CurrentDimStyle()

scriptcontext.doc = ghdoc
code_blocks.author: martinsiegrist
